definition: at all times and in all places (idiom)
Stories Old and New by Feng Menglong 馮夢龍|冯梦龙[Feng2 Meng4 long2], collection of late Ming baihua 白話|白话[bai2 hua4] tales published in 1620
"Summary of the Collection of Rhymes Old and New", supplemented and annotated Yuan dynasty version of the no-longer-extant late Song or early Yuan "Collection of Rhymes Old and New" 古今韻會|古今韵会
pinyin: Gu3 jin1 Yun4 hui4 Ju3 yao4

definition: to leave an example for all generations

sentences.english: The success, is in each individual heart the loftiest dream.
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，无人不在时时刻刻做着成功的梦想。

sentences.english: His book, "Ancient and Modern Book of General calendar" is the History of China's first calendar.
sentences.chinese: 他写的《古今历法通考》，是我国第一部历学史。

sentences.english: The army is nothing against pay the fee rates, and frightening.
sentences.chinese: 军无丝毫之饷反需交此费者，古今骇闻也。

sentences.english: This bourn is the one that many serious authors go in for.
sentences.chinese: 这是古今中外许多严肃的艺术家孜孜以求的艺术境界。

sentences.english: All times, how many people in order to serve the motherland has been heavy resistance difficult?
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，有多少人为了报效祖国而受到了重重阻难？

sentences.english: Over the centuries the vantage point for watching the tides has changed.
sentences.chinese: 钱塘观潮的地点，古今有所不同。

sentences.english: Yuan Hong, "In the history of transmission of the hing, so pass ancient and modern and Benedict Norm."
sentences.chinese: 袁宏提出，“史传之兴，所以通古今而笃名教”。

sentences.english: World best landscape, ancient and modern Fuchun push.
sentences.chinese: 天下佳山水，古今推富春。

sentences.english: For continuation of history, Ten Chronicles expanded the scope of records and preserved sufficient material.
sentences.chinese: 通古今的十志扩大了记事范围，保存了丰富的内容。

sentences.english: Stop and think before making the decisions, well, seems to work in all countries the history.
sentences.chinese: 先静下来，好好思考，再做决定，看来古今中外皆然。

sentences.english: Man. At the most, man and woman are equal, coz except for Matriarchy;
sentences.chinese: 至多就是平等，古今中外女人没占过主导地位。

sentences.english: A colorful history of coins and currency from their very beginnings.
sentences.chinese: 一部图文并茂的钱币史，纵贯古今，精彩纷呈。

sentences.english: Li Siguang is the greatest scientist that ever lived.
sentences.chinese: 李四光是古今最伟大的科学家。

sentences.english: It is that Chinese and Western culture exchange burns, crystal being philosophic theory at all time.
sentences.chinese: 它是中西文化的交流点，是古今哲理的结晶。

sentences.english: He read all kinds of books , ancient and modern, Chinese and foreign.
sentences.chinese: 他看了各式各样的书，古今中外都有。

sentences.english: These exploitations established Tao Yuanming's high status as a topping poet in ancient times or today.
sentences.chinese: 这七大开拓，奠定了陶渊明古今一流诗人的崇高地位。

definition: for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
at all times and in all places (idiom)
since ancient times/it has ever been the case that/see also 自古以來|自古以来[zi4 gu3 yi3 lai2]
worthy predecessor/distinguished person of the past/former sage
